Properties.ProtectedString:
local Tool = script.Parent local Candy = Tool.Handle
local vCharacter local myTorso local myHumanoid
local throwAnim
Tool.Enabled = true
local debris = game:GetService("Debris")
function sleep(hit, candyClone) if hit and hit.Parent and candyClone then local humanoid = hit.Parent:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") if hit.Parent:IsA("Accessory") then humanoid = hit.Parent.Parent:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") end
if humanoid ~= nil and humanoid ~= myHumanoid and myHumanoid ~= nil and candyClone then humanoid:TakeDamage(4) humanoid.WalkSpeed = 0.0 if candyClone then candyClone:Remove() end local character = humanoid.Parent if character:FindFirstChild("SleepScript") == nil then local cloneScript = Tool.SleepScript:Clone() cloneScript.Parent = character cloneScript.Disabled = false
local sleepy = cloneScript:FindFirstChild("Sleepy") if sleepy then sleepy.Value = 1 end else local sleepy = character.SleepScript:FindFirstChild("Sleepy") if sleepy then sleepy.Value = sleepy.Value + 1 end end wait(0.1) humanoid.WalkSpeed = 16.0 end end end
function shoot(direction, candyClone) if myTorso and myHumanoid then local spawnPos = Candy.Position + direction * 4.0 candyClone.CFrame = CFrame.new(spawnPos, spawnPos + direction)
candyClone.Velocity = (direction + Vector3.new(0, 2, 0)).unit * 45.0 candyClone.RotVelocity = Vector3.new(0, 10, 0)
local floatForce = Instance.new("BodyForce") floatForce.force = Vector3.new(0, candyClone:GetMass() * 88.1, 0) floatForce.Parent = candyClone
candyClone.Parent = game.Workspace
candyClone.Touched:connect(function(hit) sleep(hit, candyClone) end)
debris:AddItem(candyClone, 2.5) end end
function onActivated() if Tool.Enabled == false then return end
vCharacter = Tool.Parent myTorso = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Torso") or vCharacter:FindFirstChild("UpperTorso") myHumanoid = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Humanoid")
if myTorso == nil or myHumanoid == nil then return end
Tool.Enabled = false
local candyClone = Candy:Clone() candyClone.CanCollide = true
Candy.Transparency = 1.0
local target = myHumanoid.TargetPoint local direction = (target - Candy.Position).unit
shoot(direction, candyClone)
wait(0.25) Candy.Transparency = 0.0 Tool.Enabled = true end
function onEquipped() vCharacter = Tool.Parent myTorso = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Torso") or vCharacter:FindFirstChild("UpperTorso") myHumanoid = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") end
function onUnequipped() if throwAnim then throwAnim:Stop() end end
Tool.Activated:connect(onActivated) Tool.Equipped:connect(onEquipped) Tool.Unequipped:connect(onUnequipped)
Candy.Touched:connect(sleep)

local vCharacter = script.Parent
local vPlayer = game.Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(vCharacter) local backpack = nil
if vPlayer then backpack = vPlayer:FindFirstChild("Backpack") end
local sleeping = false
local myTorso = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Torso") or vCharacter:FindFirstChild("UpperTorso") local myHumanoid = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Humanoid")
local debris = game:GetService("Debris")
if myTorso == nil or myHumanoid == nil then script:Remove() end
while script:FindFirstChild("Sleepy") == nil do wait() end
local toolInHand = nil local backpackItems = {} local zStorage = {}
local sleepVal = script.Sleepy sleepVal.Changed:connect(function() if sleepVal and sleepVal.Value > 5 and not sleeping then
local duration = 4.5 if script:FindFirstChild("Duration") and script.Duration.Value > 0 then duration = script.Duration.Value end
backpackItems = {} toolInHand = nil sleeping = true sleepVal.Value = 0
myHumanoid.WalkSpeed = 0.0 myTorso.Anchored = true
local children = vCharacter:GetChildren() for i = 1, #children do if children[i] and children[i]:IsA("Tool") then toolInHand = children[i] toolInHand.Parent = nil end end
if backpack then local bChildren = backpack:GetChildren() for j = 1, #bChildren do if bChildren[j] then table.insert(backpackItems, bChildren[j]) bChildren[j].Parent = nil end end end
while duration > 0 do
local z = Instance.new("Part") z.Name = "Z" z.CFrame = (vCharacter.Head.CFrame + Vector3.new(0, 1, 0)) * CFrame.Angles(math.pi/2, 0, 0) z.CanCollide = false
local zMesh = Instance.new("SpecialMesh") zMesh.Parent = z zMesh.MeshId = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=65046096" zMesh.TextureId = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=65020347" zMesh.Scale = Vector3.new(0.05, 0.05, 0.05)
local floatForce = Instance.new("BodyForce") floatForce.force = Vector3.new(0, z:GetMass() * workspace.Gravity * 1.05, 0) floatForce.Parent = z
z.Parent = game.Workspace
table.insert(zStorage, z)
coroutine.resume(coroutine.create(function() while z and zMesh and #zStorage > 0 do zMesh.Scale = zMesh.Scale + Vector3.new(0.005, 0.005, 0.005) wait(0.05) end end))
wait(0.25) duration = duration - 0.25
debris:AddItem(z, 1) end
myHumanoid.WalkSpeed = 16.0 myTorso.Anchored = false if toolInHand then toolInHand.Parent = vCharacter end for a = 1, #backpackItems do if backpackItems[a] then backpackItems[a].Parent = backpack end end zStorage = {} -- free memory
wait(5.0) sleeping = false end end)
coroutine.resume(coroutine.create(function() wait(60) if sleeping then wait(1.0) myHumanoid.WalkSpeed = 16.0 myTorso.Anchored = false if toolInHand then toolInHand.Parent = vCharacter end for a = 1, #backpackItems do if backpackItems[a] then backpackItems[a].Parent = backpack end end zStorage = {} -- free memory end script:Remove() end))

Tool = script.Parent
local stillEquipped = false
function onEquippedLocal(mouse) stillEquipped = true if mouse == nil then print("Mouse not found") return end while stillEquipped do print("Setting Mouse to go") mouse.Icon = "rbxasset://textures\\GunCursor.png" while Tool.Enabled and stillEquipped do wait(0.01) end print("Setting Mouse to wait") mouse.Icon = "rbxasset://textures\\GunWaitCursor.png" while not Tool.Enabled and stillEquipped do wait(0.01) end end end
function onUnequippedLocal() stillEquipped = false end
Tool.Equipped:connect(onEquippedLocal) Tool.Unequipped:connect(onUnequippedLocal)
